main.name: Nomaan Ahmed
main.description: I'm a Software Engineer with a proven history of being able to design, develop, and deliver well-built products.
main.bio: I like to solve problems and build things. Lately, I've been trying to do both of those at scale. Always looking to make an impact - have something in mind? Let's talk.
main.contactmessage: Have something in mind? Let's talk.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Graduated from the Gina Cody School of Engineering & Computer Science at Concordia University with a Bachelor’s of Engineering in Software Engineering. Focus on Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence and Big Data.

work.tagline: Global startup specializing in all aspects of ecommerce enabling major brands to expand worldwide. Brands include Urban Outfitters, American Eagle, Crate & Barrel & others.
work.title: Engineering Manager
description: Reporting directly to CEO, managed roadmaps and feature development of Localised products in support of major brands (American Eagle, Urban Outfitters, Crate&Barrel, Saks Fifth Avenue, etc.) as well as technical representation of Localised in external meetings.

work.tagline: Multinational financial services corporation responsible for the largest payment processing network in the world specializing in cashless payments.
work.title: Product Engineering Manager
description: Promotion due to performance, already fulfilling role responsibilities, and ability to communicate effectively across technical and non-technical parties.
Managed team of 10-15 developers located in 4 countries across 3 time zones by hiring/terminating, managing budget, and respecting promised deliverable schedule.

Delivered 2 new web applications used in B2B FinTech involving Fortune 500 companies by translating stakeholder needs into software design, development, and delivery, while managing 2 existing applications.
Scaled machine learning algorithm for evaluating companies by rearchitecting, better data sourcing/wrangling, and hiring data analysts.

work.title: Software Engineer - Full Stack
description: Developed and assisted in design & architecture of 2 SPWAs using ReactJS, NodeJS, Python & PostgreSQL as part of a team.
Implemented proprietary algorithms for scoring businesses based on data analysis of over 1000 points of financial data & machine learning.
Suggested and integrated best practices including sprint planning, code quality, coverage, and unit testing, among others.

work.tagline: Largest independent video game publisher worldwide with multi-billion dollar revenue from major IPs and AAA video game franchises such as Assassin's Creed & Tom Clancy.
work.title: Intermediate Tools Developer
description: Received offer to transfer teams at request of new team lead & favorable recommendation of previous team lead. Accepted due to interest in the technologies being used.
Developed, maintained, and optimized internal tool for managing gameplay analytics for AAA video games (incl. Assassin’s Creed & Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six.)
Mentored team of 3 junior developers and interns on rotation.

work.title: Tools Developer
description: Developed, maintained, and optimized real-time collaboration tool used in production of AAA video games (incl. Assassin’s Creed & Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six.)
Developed an internal web application for world-building in AAA video games linking directly to game engines. Built using a MEAN (MongoDB, Express.js, Angular (TypeScript), and Node.js) stack.

work.tagline: Multi-billion dollar world leader in design and production of cast and forged severe service valves and steam traps across major industrial applications.
work.title: Junior Manager, Engineering Schematics
description: Managed team of drafting technicians in the planning, production, and delivery of schematics for cast and forged severe service valves and steam traps used in major industrial applications.
Analysis and reporting of chemical processing procedures and reviewing & drafting of technical drawings for manufacturing of industrial valves.
Automated many daily tasks using scripts to increase efficiency.

web.name: JavaScript
web.details: React, React Native, Express.js, Node.js, Angular

oop.name: Python
oop.details: Anaconda, TensorFlow, Pandas, Big Data, ML, AI

testimonials.text: Nomaan was an absolute professional and a pleasure to work with. I've never seen someone so able to discuss complex and technical ideas, but also simplify them when necessary. He reminds me of myself.
